T02D1814:195b-1: badzra sa tva s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1814:195b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba //

T02D1814:202a-38: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par byed //
T02D1814:202b-0: ces bya ba de ltar phyi nang @202b gi bdag
T02D1814:202b-1: nyid can gyi phyag rgyal nges par byas nas da
T02D1814:202b-2: ni rigs lnga'i brtag pa'i rim pa brtan par bya
T02D1814:202b-3: ste / aom ni spyi bor ro //
T02D1814:202b-7: h'a rkang pa gnyis la dgod do //
T02D1814:202b-8: khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi spyan ma la sogs pa rnams dgod do //
T02D1814:202b-9: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dgod do //
T02D1814:202b-10: yang de'i lag pa la sogs pa yan lag rnams la khro mo'i rgyal mo rnams dgod de /
T02D1814:202b-11: de'i lag pa g-yas pa la ro langs ma'o //
T02D1814:202b-12: lag pa g-yon pa la gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o //
T02D1814:202b-15: yang g-yas kyi cha la sna tshogs rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1814:202b-16: g-yon gyi cha la sna tshogs rin chen ma'o //
T02D1814:202b-17: pus mo g-yas par sna tshogs padma'o //
T02D1814:202b-18: pus mo g-yon par sna tshogs las ma'o //
T02D1814:202b-19: spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1814:202b-20: rkang pa gnyis las 'dzin gyi lha mo dgod par
T02D1814:202b-21: bya'o zhes gsungs pa 'di'i mdo ni le'u brgyad pa
T02D1814:202b-22: las / nu ma gnyis kyi bar dang ji srid spyi bor phyin gyi bar //
T02D1814:202b-23: rkang par thug gi bar du yang ni cho ga shes pas dgod //
T02D1814:202b-24: rked pa lte bar gsang ba'i rgyal ba'i sras //
T02D1814:202b-25: rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya //
T02D1814:202b-27: de ltar mngon par 'dus byas nas tha mal pa'i
T02D1814:202b-28: bung med kyi rang bzhin bsal te rim pa 'dis
T02D1814:202b-29: rdo rje dang padma byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1814:202b-30: h'um gis rang gi rtags rdo rje rtse lnga par bsams nas /
T02D1814:202b-31: dbus kyi rtse mo la aom dgod pa ni rdo rje 'dus bya ba'o //
T02D1814:202b-32: de'i chos 'byung a'a: bsams nas de las skyes pa'i
T02D1814:202b-33: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bsam pa ni
T02D1814:202b-35: 'di'i mdo ni le'u bdun pa las /
T02D1814:202b-36: yi ge h'um dang yi ge aom //
T02D1814:202b-37: yi ge phat kyang rnam brtags te /
T02D1814:202b-39: rdo rje padma bsgom par bya //
T02D1814:202b-41: de la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang
T02D1814:202b-42: ldan pas phan tshun rjes su chags pa sngon du
T02D1814:202b-43: 'gro bas 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba la sogs
T02D1814:202b-44: pa byas nas le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i sngags
T02D1814:203a-0: kyis @203a * // gnyis su med pa'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1814:203a-1: de la sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D1814:203a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1814:203a-3: na sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba
T02D1814:203a-4: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis bya'o //
T02D1814:203a-5: de nas h'um gi glu blangs pas las la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1814:203a-6: 'jig pa'i gnas skabs su phat kyi yi ge brjod par bya'o //
T02D1814:203a-7: de nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams mchog
T02D1814:203a-8: tu dga' pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bas rtsa'i
T02D1814:203a-9: bu gnas thig le'u gzugs kyis padma'i dbus su 'bab
T02D1814:203a-10: pa'o // 'di'i mdo ni le'u dang po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02D1814:203a-12: thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs so zhes gsungs so //
T02D1814:203a-13: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gnas skabs
T02D1814:203a-14: su don yod grub pa'i byin gyis brlabs la lhag
T02D1814:203a-15: par mos pa byas nas le'u drug pa las gsungs
T02D1814:203a-16: pa'i mchod pa'i rim pas gnyis su med pa'i nga
T02D1814:203a-17: rgyal bya'o // de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1814:203a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a pa a'atma ko& ham zhes gsungs so //
T02D1814:203a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rjes su zhugs pas bdag
T02D1814:203a-20: nyid byin gyis brlabs nas ting nge 'dzin dang dbang
T02D1814:203a-21: bskur ba dang / mchod pa mthar thug pa'i rigs
T02D1814:203a-22: thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi nga rgyal byas nas
T02D1814:203a-23: bskur ba dang / / gzhan gyi don phun sum
T02D1814:203a-24: tshogs pa'i don du srid pa skye ba'i rim pas
T02D1814:203a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o //
T02D1814:203a-26: de la mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems
T02D1814:203a-27: can rnams kyi zhe sdang gi nyon mongs pa sbyong
T02D1814:203a-28: bar byed do // de bzhin du rnam par snang
T02D1814:203a-29: mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gti mug rnam par
T02D1814:203a-31: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis nga rgyal rnam par sbyong ngo //
T02D1814:203a-32: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ngo //
T02D1814:203a-33: don yod grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phrag dog rnam par sbyong ngo //
T02D1814:203a-34: bcom ldan 'das de nyid spyan ma'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1814:203a-35: gyis sems can rnams kyi nad la sogs pa zhi
T02D1814:203a-36: bar byed pa'o // m'a ma k'i'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyas par byed pa'o //
T02D1814:203a-37: gos dkar mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung bar byed do //
T02D1814:203b-0: @203b sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang du byed do //
T02D1814:203b-1: bcom ldan 'das de nyid gzugs rdo rje la sogs par gyur nas //
T02D1814:203b-2: sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba skyed par byed do //
T02D1814:203b-3: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de nyid sa'i snying
T02D1814:203b-4: po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D1814:203b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can rnams kyi skye mched
T02D1814:203b-7: bcom ldan 'das de nyid gshin rje gshed po la
T02D1814:203b-8: sogs pa'i khro bo rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D1814:203b-9: phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs rnams sdigs par byed do
T02D1814:203b-10: // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor kun //
T02D1814:203b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1814:203b-12: de yi nye bar longs spyod kun //
T02D1814:203b-13: khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa'o //
T02D1814:203b-15: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
T02D1814:203b-16: de ltar sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor lo mngon par sprul nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1814:203b-17: phyi nang gi bdag nyid can gyi bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1814:203b-18: yang slar bdag nyid de bzhin nyid du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1814:203b-19: de nas spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis
T02D1814:203b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bde ba chen po ma
T02D1814:203b-21: mthong bas bral bas skyo ba'i dbang gis rdo rje
T02D1814:203b-22: thugs khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i glu rnams
T02D1814:203b-23: kyis bde ba chen po sad par byed do //
T02D1814:203b-24: de la glu ni 'di yin te /
T02D1814:203b-25: sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs //
T02D1814:203b-26: dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D1814:203b-27: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1814:203b-28: sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1814:203b-29: rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan //
T02D1814:203b-30: sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par gzigs //
T02D1814:203b-31: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1814:203b-32: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1814:203b-33: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste sems can kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba //
T02D1814:203b-34: 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson//
T02D1814:204a-0: @204a * // mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1814:204a-1: spyod pa dri med kun du bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1814:204a-2: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02D1814:204a-3: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa rjes brtse ba //
T02D1814:204a-4: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1814:204a-5: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1814:204a-6: de ltar yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod nas
T02D1814:204a-7: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis bzhengs nas de
T02D1814:204a-8: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi bskyod pa zhes bya
T02D1814:204a-9: ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis
T02D1814:204a-10: bstod de / de la bstod pa ni 'di yin te //
T02D1814:204a-11: mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che //
T02D1814:204a-12: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02D1814:204a-13: rdo rje mchog gsum dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1814:204a-14: gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1814:204a-15: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02D1814:204a-16: rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02D1814:204a-17: rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1814:204a-18: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1814:204a-19: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1814:204a-20: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med //
T02D1814:204a-21: gsang pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1814:204a-22: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
T02D1814:204a-23: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1814:204a-24: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1814:204a-25: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1814:204a-26: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1814:204a-27: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D1814:204a-28: dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02D1814:204a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1814:204a-30: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag
T02D1814:204a-31: par gsal bar byas nas dkyil 'khor la rjes su
T02D1814:204a-32: chags par byas la sngar bzhin du rang gi lus
T02D1814:204a-33: kyi dkyil 'khor la bcug nas rim pa 'dis nye
T02D1814:204a-35: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i h'um brjod nas des
T02D1814:204a-36: sems can gyi khams thams cad rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1814:204a-37: po'i gzugs kyis yongs su gyur par bsams nas de
T02D1814:204a-38: yid la byed par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1814:204a-39: 'di'i mdo ni le'u bcu gnyis pa las //
T02D1814:204a-40: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1814:204a-41: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1814:204b-0: @204b h'um ni de yi dbus gnas par //
T02D1814:204b-1: rang gi gzugs brnyan dag tu brtag / ces gsungs so //
T02D1814:204b-2: de ltar las dang po pa dam tshig dang sdom
T02D1814:204b-3: pa la gnas shing dbang thob pas tha mal pa'i
T02D1814:204b-4: nga rgyal bsal la thun bzhir lha'i rnal 'byor goms
T02D1814:204b-5: par byed pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum
T02D1814:204b-6: tshogs pa la mos pas zhi ba'i las la sogs
T02D1814:204b-7: pa shin tu khyad par can yang bya'o //
T02D1814:204b-8: sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i rim pas kha zas sbyang ba dang snying ga sbyang ba dang /
T02D1814:204b-10: kha zas kyi bya ba byas nas bde bar 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1814:204b-11: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi sbyin sreg yi ge gsum mam /
T02D1814:204b-13: sngags dang sman gyi sbyor bas kyang rdo rje dang
T02D1814:204b-14: padma mnyam par sbyar ba byas nas las thams cad
T02D1814:204b-15: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni las kyi rgyal
T02D1814:204b-16: po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o
T02D1814:204b-17: // dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i
T02D1814:204b-18: rgyud kyi srid pa skye ba'i rim pas rdo rje
T02D1814:204b-19: sems dpa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon zla ba grags pas
T02D1814:204b-22: // / gzhung 'di'i tshad ni rkang pa dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1814:204b-23: dpal bi kra ma sh'i la'i gtsug lag khang chen
T02D1814:204b-24: por pandi ta mkhas pa chen po ta th'a ga
T02D1814:204b-25: ta rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D1814:204b-26: lo ts'a ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyis bsgyur ro //
T02D1814:204b-27: slad kyis dpal tho ling dpe med lhun gyis grub
T02D1814:204b-28: pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po
T02D1814:204b-29: mkhas pa chen po d'i pam k'a ra rakshi ta
T02D1814:204b-30: dang / khams pa dge slong lo ts'a ba ba
